alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Knox (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 11:43AM EST until further notice by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity for the following rivers in Indiana... White River at Hazleton. .An inch to almost two inches of prior rainfall along with an incoming system bringing a wintry precipitation mix will bring some moderate flooding to lower portions of the White River. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Hazleton. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Extensive river flooding continues in northern Gibson County. Numerous county roads were flooded in March 2011. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 25.0 feet Friday evening. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued later this evening.
